content.en: SDR advancements: Researchers are exploring how software-defined radio (SDR) technology can improve performance and data rates in 3G systems, as well as the effectiveness of system diversity and organizational principles in SDR. They are also investigating how SDR basestations can perform signal processing tasks in the digital domain, and how RF architectures can be integrated with baseband signal processing for high-performance SDR. Additionally, they are developing algorithms to optimize energy consumption, improve energy efficiency, and enhance various aspects of SDR systems, such as clock recovery, interference detection, and analog signal recognition.
content.da: SDR fremskridt: Forskere undersøger, hvordan software-defineret radio (SDR) teknologi kan forbedre ydeevne og datahastigheder i 3G-systemer, samt effektiviteten af systems diversitet og organisatoriske principper i SDR. De undersøger også, hvordan SDR-basisstationer kan udføre signalbehandlingsopgaver i det digitale domæne, og hvordan RF-arkitekturer kan integreres med baseband signalbehandling for højtydende SDR. Derudover udvikler de algoritmer til at optimere energiforbrug, forbedre energieffektivitet og forbedre forskellige aspekter af SDR-systemer, såsom klokkesynkronisering, interferensdetektion og genkendelse af analoge signaler.
